apa mehidi wishesha awadharanaya karanne mema jathika urumaya pilibanda amathyanshaya bharawa nawa amathyawarayaku pathwi sitina (aacharya jagath balasuriya mahatha) me awasthawedi janadhipathithumage dewani dhura kalaya apa rate jathika urumayada aashcharyayak uda kirimata nam deshiya janathawa pamanak nowa wideshiya ratawala janathawada me sandaha sambandha karagatha yuthuwa atha.
meke gayange katahanda nuwan mahathmayage tharuna kale katahanda wagemayi.
namuth me rate purawasiyek lesa mama eese waramak dunne naha.
ee bawa danagath demapiyan ayawa ohugen mudawa ganimata nogath uthsahayak natha..
